name: jsonatax
description: A lightweight wrapper for JSONata that introduces the concept of modules in order to easily & ergonomically extend it. Import other peoples JSONata modules and dynamically import them in your expressions. Define your own modules! for other people to use!.

scripts.jsonata:subrepo:pull: echo "Updating @jsonatax/jsonata-extended from jsonata-js/jsonata repo" && pnpm git-subrepo pull ./packages/jsonata-extended
scripts.jsonata:subrepo:diff: pnpm git-subrepo fetch packages/jsonata-extended && git subrepo branch -f packages/jsonata-extended && git diff FETCH_HEAD..packages/jsonata-extended
